metadata.title: CVE-2023-31083 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/bluetooth/hci_ldisc.c in the Linuxkernel 6.2. In hci_uart_tty_ioctl, there is a race condition betweenHCIUARTSETPROTO and HCIUARTGETPROTO. HCI_UART_PROTO_SET is set beforehu->proto is set. A NULL pointer dereference may occur.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31083` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-246-generic - 4.4.0-246.280
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-246-generic - 4.4.0-246.280
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-246-lowlatency - 4.4.0-246.280
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
